# भारत का पहला स्वदेशी एआई मॉडल: सर्वम एआई

## भारत की भाषाओं के लिए एक क्रांतिकारी कदम

भारत सरकार ने देश के पहले स्वदेशी **लार्ज लैंग्यूज मॉडल (LLM)** विकसित करने के लिए बेंगलुरु स्थित स्टार्टअप **सर्वम एआई** को चुना है। यह एआई मॉडल भारतीय भाषाओं को समझने, तर्क करने और भारतीय उपयोगकर्ताओं के लिए विशेष रूप से अनुकूलित होगा, जो एक ऐतिहासिक उपलब्धि है।

## सर्वम एआई की स्थापना और चयन

- **स्थापना**: जुलाई 2023 में विवेक राघवन और प्रत्युष कुमार द्वारा स्थापित
- **चयन**: 67 कंपनियों में से चुना गया
- **भागीदारी**: 10,370 करोड़ रुपये के **इंडिया एआई मिशन** का हिस्सा

## सरकारी सहायता और तकनीकी विशेषताएँ

- **सरकारी सहायता**: 200 करोड़ रुपये मूल्य के 4,000 हाई-टेक जीपीयू प्रदान किए जाएंगे
- **समयसीमा**: 6 महीने में विकसित किया जाएगा
- **पैमाना**: 70 बिलियन पैरामीटर्स वाला मॉडल, जो वैश्विक स्तर के टॉप मॉडल्स से प्रतिस्पर्धा करेगा

## सर्वम एआई के तीन प्रमुख मॉडल

1. **सर्वम लार्ज**: जटिल प्रश्नों के उत्तर और उन्नत विश्लेषण के लिए
2. **सर्वम स्मॉल**: रियल-टाइम चैट और ऐप्स के लिए
3. **सर्वम एज**: छोटे डिवाइस (जैसे स्मार्टफोन) के लिए

## भारतीय भाषाओं और संदर्भों के लिए अनुकूलित

- **भाषा समर्थन**: हिंदी, तमिल, बंगाली सहित कई भारतीय भाषाएँ
- **विशेषताएँ**: वॉइस कमांड समझने की क्षमता, पूरे देश में उपयोग
- **डेटा सुरक्षा**: कंपनियों को विदेशों में डेटा भेजने की आवश्यकता नहीं

## वैश्विक संदर्भ में भारत की स्थिति

जब चीन का **डीप सीक एआई** वैश्विक स्तर पर छाया हुआ है, भारत भी इस क्षेत्र में तेजी से आगे बढ़ रहा है। सर्वम एआई का मॉडल न केवल सस्ता और तेज होगा, बल्कि भारतीय भाषाओं और स्थानीय आवश्यकताओं के अनुरूप विशेष रूप से डिजाइन किया गया होगा।

## निष्कर्ष

सर्वम एआई का यह प्रोजेक्ट भारत की तकनीकी स्वावलंबन की दिशा में एक महत्वपूर्ण कदम है। यह न केवल भारतीय भाषाओं में एआई की पहुंच को बढ़ाएगा, बल्कि व

# How Gen Z is Redefining Luxury in India  

## The Shift from Logos to Values  

For decades, luxury brands like Gucci, Louis Vuitton, and Rolex were symbols of status and success in India. Owning these high-end products was seen as a benchmark of achievement. However, **Gen Z is rewriting the rules of luxury**, moving away from conspicuous consumption toward **meaningful, value-driven choices**.  

Today’s youth are asking: *"Is there more to life than chasing labels?"* Unlike previous generations, who often sought validation through material possessions, **Gen Z prioritizes impact, sustainability, and ethical responsibility**.  

## The Rise of Conscious Consumerism  

A recent study reveals that **68% of Gen Z in India prefer investing in experiences and sustainable products over traditional luxury goods**. Their purchasing decisions reflect a deeper awareness of social and environmental issues. Key trends include:  

- **Supporting ethical brands** – Gen Z favors companies that align with their values, such as sustainability, equality, and fair labor practices.  
- **Valuing craftsmanship over mass production** – Homegrown brands that emphasize quality and authenticity are gaining traction.  
- **Choosing experiences over possessions** – Travel, cultural events, and meaningful interactions hold more appeal than expensive handbags or watches.  

## The Role of Influencers in Shaping Trends  

Indian influencers are amplifying this shift by promoting:  
- **Ethical fashion** – Advocating for slow fashion and sustainable materials.  
- **Conscious travel** – Encouraging eco-friendly tourism and local experiences.  
- **Responsible consumerism** – Highlighting brands that combine style with social responsibility.  

## What Defines Luxury Now?  

For Gen Z, **luxury is no longer just about the brand name—it’s about the impact**. It’s about:  
- **Authenticity** – Supporting businesses with transparent and ethical practices.  
- **Sustainability** – Choosing products that minimize environmental harm.  
- **Community & Purpose** – Making purchases that contribute to a better world.  

### Final Thought: Your Choices Shape the Future  

Every purchase is an opportunity to influence the world. **What kind of future do you want to create with yours?**  

Would you rather invest in a luxury logo or a brand that makes a difference? Let us know in the comments!  

---

**मार्केट अपडेट: मजबूत प्रदर्शन और निवेशकों के लिए सावधानियां**  

**नमस्कार, आज हम बाजार के हालात और कुछ महत्वपूर्ण कंपनियों के प्रदर्शन पर चर्चा करेंगे।**  

### **बाजार का सामान्य रुझान**  
- बाजार ने 400 अंकों की बढ़त के साथ 24,000 के स्तर को पार किया है और 29,000 के आसपास कारोबार कर रहा है।  
- डॉलर के मुकाबले रुपया 85 तक मजबूत हुआ है, जो बाजार के सकारात्मक माहौल को दर्शाता है।  
- वैश्विक स्तर पर अमेरिका, जापान और चीन के बीच चल रही बातचीत के बावजूद कोई बड़ा समझौता नहीं हुआ है, लेकिन बाजार में आशावाद बना हुआ है।  

### **प्रमुख कंपनियों के नतीजे**  

#### **1. ICICI बैंक**  
- **शुद्ध लाभ 12% बढ़कर 12,000 करोड़ रुपये पार।**  
- HDFC बैंक की तुलना में बेहतर प्रदर्शन, जिसका शुद्ध लाभ केवल 6.7% बढ़ा।  
- **HDFC की चुनौतियाँ:** जमा-ऋण अनुपात (Credit-Deposit Ratio) में समस्या बनी हुई है, जिससे विकास धीमा हो सकता है।  

#### **2. Infosys**  
- **शुद्ध लाभ 12% गिरावट के साथ निराशाजनक रहा।**  
- कंपनी ने स्पष्ट कर दिया है कि निकट भविष्य में कोई बड़ा सुधार नहीं होगा।  
- **नौकरियों में कटौती:** 700-1000 कर्मचारियों की छंटनी की जा रही है, जो फ्रेशर्स के लिए चिंता का विषय है।  

#### **3. IT सेक्टर पर दबाव**  
- TCS और अन्य IT कंपनियों के प्रदर्शन में गिरावट से निवेशकों को सावधानी बरतने की सलाह दी जा रही है।  
- **सलाह:** इस सेक्टर में निवेश से बचें, क्योंकि और गिरावट आ सकती है।  

### **ITC की नई पहल**  
- **ऑर्गेनिक केयर फूड में प्रवेश:** 24 मंत्रा कंपनी का अधिग्रहण करके 472 करोड़ रुपये का निवेश किया।  
- **बेबी केयर सेक्टर में विस्तार:** नए उत्पादों के साथ बाजार में मजबूत पकड़ बनाने की कोशिश।  

### **सोने और अन्य निवेश विकल्प**  
- **सोने की कीमतें 22 कैरेट (₹9,472) और 24 कैरेट (₹10,000) के स्तर पर स्थिर।**  
- **स्पंदना स्प्रिट (Spandana Sphoorty):** 13% की बढ़त के साथ ₹30 के स्तर पर पहुंची, लेकिन निवेशकों को लाभ लेने की सलाह।  

### **निष्कर्ष**  
- बाजार में तेजी का दौर जारी है, लेकिन निव

# **Why Being a Topper Isn’t Enough: The Importance of Skills Over Marks**  

## **The Harsh Reality: A Topper’s Struggle**  
Bisma Farid, a top-ranking student from Hansraj College, shared a heartbreaking LinkedIn post about her job search struggles. Despite having **50+ certificates, 10+ medals, and 10+ trophies**, she couldn’t land an internship. Why? Because companies today focus on **skills, not marks**.  

Her professors and relatives always told her, *"Focus on studies; they’ll help you succeed."* But in interviews, no one asked about her grades—they asked, *"What skills do you have?"* And she wasn’t prepared.  

## **Skills Matter More Than Marks**  
Companies prioritize **skills over academic scores**. But what kind of skills? There are three main types:  
1. **Hard Skills** (Technical abilities like coding, graphic design)  
2. **Soft Skills** (Communication, leadership)  
3. **Hybrid Skills** (A mix of both)  

The current job market demands **hybrid skills**—those that combine technical expertise with problem-solving and human psychology.  

## **The Root of Every Skill: Human Psychology & Problem-Solving**  
Think of skills like a tree:  
- **Leaves** = Soft Skills  
- **Trunk** = Hard Skills  
- **Branches** = Hybrid Skills  
- **Roots** = **Human Psychology & Problem-Solving**  

No matter the field, understanding **what people want** and **how to deliver it** is the foundation of success.  

### **Examples of Root Skills in Different Fields:**  
- **Graphic Design:** Color psychology, composition, storytelling  
- **Video Editing:** Pacing, eye-tracking psychology, cinematography  
- **Coding & Management:** Logical reasoning, efficiency optimization  

## **Tools ≠ Skills: Why Software Doesn’t Define Your Talent**  
Many believe mastering tools like Photoshop or Premiere Pro makes them skilled. **Wrong.** Tools are just instruments—**real skill lies in principles**.  

### **Proof? This Video Was Edited on a Budget Software**  
The creator admits:  
- He started with **basic editing software** (Filmora) because he couldn’t afford high-end tools.  
- Yet, he produced professional-quality videos because he **understood core principles** (composition, color theory, pacing).  
- Even now, he prefers **Canva for thumbnails**—proving that **software doesn’t limit creativity**.  

### **Want to Learn Design? Follow These Free Resources:**  
- **Sari Graphics (YouTube)** – Master design psychology.  
- **Piximperfect** – Learn software techniques.  
- **Pinterest/Instagram (@pict. AI, @pict.undrz)** – Get creative inspiration.  

## **How to Learn Skills Faster?**  
1. **Copy to Learn** – Replicate great designs/videos to understand techniques.  
2. **Document Your Journey** – Start a **#30DayChallenge** (e.g., *"60 Days to Become a Graphic Designer"*).  
3. **Books Over Expensive Courses** – Invest in foundational knowledge (e.g., *"Steal Like an Artist"* for creativity).  

## **Adobe Creative Cloud Hack: Extend Your Free Trial**  
- Adobe offers a **7-day free trial**, but you can get **extra days legally**:  
  1. **Cancel before trial ends** → Adobe may offer **extra free days**.  
  2. **After trial ends**, they often give **discounted plans**.  
- **Warning:** Monthly plans lock you into a **year-long commitment** with heavy cancellation fees.  

## **Final Takeaway**  
- **Marks alone won’t secure jobs—skills will.**  
- **Master root skills (psychology + problem-solving).**  
- **Tools don’t define talent—principles do.**  
- **Learn smart: Copy, document progress, use free resources.**  

**What’s your skill-building strategy?** Let’s discuss in the comments! 🚀  

*(For more details, check the video description for resource links.)*

हमारे पास वीडियो ट्रांसक्रिप्ट का विश्लेषण करने के बाद, यहां एक संरचित ब्लॉग पोस्ट है:

---

# क्या 30,000 का निफ्टी लक्ष्य 2026 तक संभव है?  

## मुख्य विचार  

- **विवेक सिंघल** ने 7 अप्रैल 2024 को एक ट्वीट किया, जिसमें **निफ्टी 30,000** के 2026 तक पहुँचने की संभावना पर चर्चा की गई।  
- यह विचार **अमेरिका-चीन व्यापार युद्ध, वैश्विक अर्थव्यवस्था और भारत की विकास क्षमता** के संदर्भ में रखा गया।  

---

## 1. अमेरिका-चीन व्यापार युद्ध का प्रभाव  

- **ऐतिहासिक पैटर्न**: अतीत में अमेरिका ने चीन पर टैरिफ लगाए, जिससे अमेरिकी अर्थव्यवस्था को नुकसान हुआ।  
- **वर्तमान स्थिति**: इस बार चीन ने **प्रतिशोधात्मक टैरिफ नहीं लगाए**, जिससे अमेरिका को फायदा हो सकता है।  
- **भारत की भूमिका**: भारत ने अमेक्सिका के साथ **प्रतिशोधी कार्रवाई नहीं की**, जिससे व्यापार संबंध सुधर सकते हैं।  

---

## 2. भारतीय अर्थव्यवस्था के लिए संभावनाएँ  

### 2.1. फार्मा सेक्टर  
- अमेरिका ने भारतीय दवाओं पर **टैरिफ बढ़ाए**, लेकिन यह प्रभाव सीमित है क्योंकि भारत **नेट आयातक** है।  
- **दवाओं की कीमतों** में मामूली वृद्धि हो सकती है, लेकिन यह वैश्विक बाजार को बड़े पैमाने पर प्रभावित नहीं करेगा।  

### 2.2. स्टील उद्योग  
- भारत **नेट स्टील आयातक** है, इसलिए अमेरिकी टैरिफ का सीधा प्रभाव नहीं।  
- **घरेलू उत्पादन बढ़ाने** का मौका मिल सकता है।  

### 2.3. ऑटोमोबाइल सेक्टर  
- **यूरोपीय कारों पर भारी टैरिफ** के कारण, भारतीय कंपनियों को **प्रतिस्पर्धा में फायदा** हो सकता है।  

---

## 3. निफ्टी 30,000 का लक्ष्य: कैसे संभव?  

### 3.1. तकनीकी विश्लेषण  
- **ऐतिहासिक पैटर्न** के अनुसार, बड़ी गिरावट के बाजार में **लोअर सर्किट** लगने के बाद **रिकवरी** होती है।  
- **लंबी अवधि के निवेशकों** के लिए यह एक अच्छा अवसर हो सकता है।  

### 3.2. वैश्विक निवेशकों का रुख  
- **अमेरिका-चीन तनाव** के कारण, निवेशक **भारत जैसे उभरते बाजारों** की ओर रुख कर सकते हैं।

### **Lovable 2.0: A Game-Changer for No-Code Web Development**  

In the latest update, **Lovable 2.0** has introduced a suite of powerful new features that make it easier than ever to build and deploy real-world applications—even if you’re not a coder. This blog post will break down the **five biggest updates** in Lovable 2.0 and show you how they work in action.  

---

## **1. Enhanced Visual Editing Platform**  
Lovable 2.0 has significantly improved its **visual editor**, allowing users to click on any element in their web app and modify it directly. You can adjust:  
- Text, font size, padding, and styling  
- Layout and design elements without writing a single line of code  

This is a major upgrade from previous versions, where users had to manually edit code or request changes through prompts.  

---

## **2. Full Dev Mode Support**  
For developers, Lovable now supports **Dev Mode**, enabling seamless switching between:  
- **Prompt-based editing** (for no-code users)  
- **Direct code editing** (for developers)  

**Key benefits:**  
- All changes can be saved directly to **GitHub**  
- No more manual importing/exporting—everything is streamlined  

---

## **3. AI-Powered Chat Mode Agent**  
Lovable’s new **Chat Mode Agent** is a powerful AI assistant that can:  
- Answer questions about your project  
- Debug issues  
- Help plan and implement major updates  

Once you and the AI agree on a plan, you can click **"Implement Changes"**, and the AI will handle the rest.  

---

## **4. Multiplayer Mode for Collaboration**  
Lovable now supports **real-time collaboration**, allowing teams to:  
- Work on the same project simultaneously  
- Share billing under a single account  
- Make changes in a unified workspace  

This eliminates the need for external tools like GitHub for basic collaboration.  

---

## **5. Built-In Custom Domain Support**  
No more jumping between different platforms to buy a domain—Lovable now lets you:  
- Purchase and configure a **custom domain** directly in the app  
- Set up SSL certificates for secure HTTPS connections  

The process is simple, and you can manage everything from the Lovable dashboard.  

---

## **Bonus: Transparent Pricing**  
Lovable has simplified its pricing structure:  
- **Free Tier:** 5 daily credits (public projects)  
- **Pro Tier:** $25/month for 100 credits (private projects, custom domains)  
- **Team Tier:** Custom pricing for larger teams  

Each **credit = 1 message/action**, making it easy to track usage.  

---

## **Live Demo: Building a Website in 10 Minutes**  
The video demonstrates how to:  
1. Use the **visual editor** to tweak elements in real-time.  
2. Implement an **AI-generated plan** to redesign a YouTube video gallery.  
3. Switch to **Dev Mode** for direct code adjustments.  
4. Publish the site and set up a **custom domain** (e.g., `aiwithbrandon.com`).  

The entire process is seamless, proving that **Lovable 2.0 is a game-changer for no-code and pro developers alike.**  

---

## **Final Thoughts**  
Lovable 2.0 is a **powerful, user-friendly platform** that bridges the gap between no-code and full-stack development. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced developer, the new features make it easier to build, collaborate, and deploy stunning web applications.  

**Want to try it out?** Check out the [Lovable 2.0 website](https://lovable.dev) and start building today!  

For a deeper dive into integrating Lovable with tools like **Supabase**, let us know in the comments!  

Happy coding! 🚀

# OpenAI's New GPT-4.1 Models: Key Updates and When to Use Them  

OpenAI has just released three new models—**GPT-4.1, GPT-4.1 Mini, and GPT-4.1 Nano**—bringing significant improvements in performance, cost, and functionality. In this post, we’ll break down the most important updates and help you decide whether to integrate these models into your AI projects.  

---  

## **7 Key Improvements in GPT-4.1**  

### **1. Expanded Context Window (1 Million Tokens)**  
- Previous models maxed out at **128K tokens**, but GPT-4.1 now supports **1 million tokens**.  
- Performs exceptionally well in **"needle-in-a-haystack" tests**, accurately retrieving information even in the middle of long documents.  

### **2. Better Long-Conversation Understanding (Doubled MRC Score)**  
- **MRC (Machine Reading Comprehension) score doubled**, meaning the model tracks references in long conversations more effectively.  
- Example: If you say, *"Improve my email,"* it correctly identifies which email you're referring to from earlier in the chat.  

### **3. Improved Instruction Following (60-70% Better Than GPT-4.0)**  
- Handles **complex instructions** (e.g., *"Always return results in markdown"*) and **negative instructions** (e.g., *"Never use emojis in emails"*) much better.  
- Crucial for **production-level AI applications** where precise behavior is required.  

### **4. Enhanced Coding Capabilities**  
- **Doubled performance** on the **SWE benchmark** (solving coding problems) compared to GPT-4.0.  
- **Outperformed GPT-4.5** in coding tasks, despite being cheaper.  
- However, **still lags behind Claude 3.5 Sonnet and Gemini 2.5 Pro** in **Polyglot benchmark** (editing code within files).  

### **5. Lower Pricing (20% Cheaper Than GPT-4.0)**  
| Model | Input Cost (per 1M tokens) | Output Cost (per 1M tokens) |  
|--------|----------------|----------------|  
| **GPT-4.1** | $2 | $8 |  
| **GPT-4.0** | $2.50 | $10 |  
- **GPT-4.1 Mini (3x more expensive than GPT-4.0 Mini)** but offers **1M token context**.  
- **GPT-4.1 Nano** is the **cheapest and fastest** option (10¢ per 1M tokens).  

### **6. Faster Response Times**  
- **GPT-4.1 Nano** is the **fastest** (lowest latency), making it ideal for **voice agents**.  
- **Throughput (tokens per second)** scales with model intelligence:  
  - **Dumb models = fast, smart models = slower**.  
  - **GPT-4.1 is faster than GPT-4.0** but still slower than Claude/Gemini for complex tasks.  

### **7. API-Only & Replaces GPT-4.5**  
- **Not available in ChatGPT**—only via API.  
- **GPT-4.5 is being deprecated** in favor of GPT-4.1 (cheaper and just as smart).  

---  

## **Should You Use GPT-4.1?**  

### **✅ Best For: AI Agents & Workflow Automation**  
- **Excels in following complex instructions** (e.g., writing structured newsletters, multi-step workflows).  
- **Great speed-to-cost ratio** for **AI agents** (faster than Gemini, cheaper than GPT-4.5).  

### **❌ Not the Best For: Coding & Advanced Chatting**  
- **Coding:** **Claude 3.5 Sonnet** and **Gemini 2.5 Pro** outperform GPT-4.1.  
- **Chatting:** **Gemini 2.5 Pro** is smarter but slower; GPT-4.1 struggles with deep reasoning.  

### **Final Verdict:**  
- **Use GPT-4.1 for AI agents and structured tasks.**  
- **For coding, stick with Claude 3.5 or Gemini 2.5.**  
- **For budget-friendly tasks, consider GPT-4.1 Nano (fastest & cheapest).**  

---  

## **Wrapping Up**  
OpenAI’s new models bring **better performance, lower costs, and expanded context windows**, but they’re not always the best choice. **If you're building AI agents, GPT-4.1

# Building a Full App on Your Phone: A Real-World Test  

## Introduction  
Imagine getting a brilliant app idea while commuting—no laptop, just your phone. Instead of waiting, you start building immediately and have a working MVP by the time you reach your destination. Sounds too good to be true? In this experiment, we test whether it’s possible to develop, refine, and even publish an app using only a smartphone.  

## Step 1: Setting Up the Tools  
### Download Replit  
1. Search for **Replit** in your phone’s app store and install it.  
2. Log in (or create an account if you don’t have one).  

Replit’s cloud-based environment allows you to code, test, and deploy apps directly from your phone—no computer needed.  

### Shortcut #1: Brain Dumper AI  
Instead of vague prompts, use **[Brain Dumper](https://brain-dumper.ai/)** to structure your idea:  
- Describe your app concept (e.g., "an app that analyzes shower thoughts").  
- Select **Mobile App** and generate a detailed project outline.  
- Copy the output for Replit.  

### Shortcut #2: Expo Template  
1. Use a pre-optimized **Expo template** (link in the video description).  
2. Click **Remix**, name your project, and create it.  
3. Hit the **Play** button to launch the app.  

The template saves time and Replit credits while providing a live preview within the app.  

## Step 2: Customizing the App  
### Optimize AI Assistance  
1. Go to **Assistant Settings** in Replit.  
2. Add a custom prompt:  
   - *"This is an Expo project for building React Native apps. Frame your responses accordingly."*  
3. Paste your Brain Dumper context and let Replit generate the app.  

### Debugging & Iterating  
- **Errors?** Copy-paste them into the AI for fixes.  
- **Placeholder data?** Integrate **DeepSeek AI** for real analysis:  
  - Add a `DeepSeek API Key` via Replit’s **Secrets** tab.  
  - Test the AI’s feedback (e.g., "Evaluate my shower thought").  

### UI Upgrades  
Prompt: *"Make the app more beautiful and professional."*  
Result: Cleaner interface, animations, and concise AI outputs.  

## Step 3: Publishing to the App Store (The Hard Part)  
### Mobile Challenges  
Attempting to publish via Replit’s mobile app led to repeated errors. Solution: Switch to a laptop.  

### Desktop Workaround  
1. Download the project from Replit as a ZIP.  
2. Open in **VS Code** (or similar).  
3. Use **Expo CLI** commands:  
   - `npx eas-cli@latest publish --platform ios`  
   - Fix errors (e.g., missing bundle ID) with AI help.  
4. Upload to **App Store Connect** via:  
   - **TestFlight** for beta testing.  
   - Final submission (requires Apple Developer account, $99/year).  

## Key Takeaways  
1. **MVP on Mobile? Yes.** Replit + AI tools let you build a functional app quickly.  
2. **Publishing? Easier on Desktop.** Mobile debugging and App Store submissions are clunky.  
3. **AI is a Game-Changer.** From generating code to fixing errors, it accelerates development.  

### Final Thoughts  
While polishing and publishing may require a computer, the core app *can* be built entirely on a phone. For a deeper dive into mobile development with Replit, check out the creator’s [recommended video](https://example.com).  

---  
**Try it yourself!** Have you built an app on mobile? Share your experience in the comments. 🚀

# **25 अप्रैल 2024: राशिफल और दिनभर की भविष्यवाणी**

## **आज का पंचांग**
- **तिथि:** 25 अप्रैल 2024 (शुक्रवार)  
- **वार:** शुक्रवार  
- **माह:** वैशाख (कृष्ण पक्ष, द्वादशी तिथि)  
- **नक्षत्र:** पूर्व भाद्रपदा (सुबह 8:53 तक)  
- **योग:** इंद्र योग, फिर वैधति योग  
- **करण:** तैतिल (सुबह 11:45 तक)  

आज का दिन शुभ और फलदायी माना जा रहा है। आइए, जानते हैं कि आपकी राशि के लिए क्या कहता है आज का राशिफल।

---

## **राशिफल (25 अप्रैल 2024)**

### **1. मेष (Aries)**
- **मुख्य भविष्यवाणी:** आत्मविश्वास और उत्साह बढ़ेगा।  
- **आर्थिक स्थिति:** आर्थिक लाभ होगा।  
- **करियर:** तेजी से सफलता मिलेगी।

- **स्वास्थ्य:** अच्छा रहेगा।  
- **शुभ अंक:** 2, 6, 7, 9

### **2. वृष (Taurus)**

- **पारिवारिक मामले:** पैतृक कार्यों में सफलता।  
- **करियर:** प्रशासनिक कार्यों में लाभ।  
- **प्रेम जीवन:** मधुरता बनी रहेगी।

- **शुभ रंग:** चांदी सा सफेद  

### **3. मिथुन (Gemini)**
- **मुख्य भविष्यवाणी:** भाग्योन्नति के संकेत।  
- **करियर:** सक्रियता बढ़ेगी।  
- **शिक्षा:** अच्छे परिणाम मिलेंगे।  
- **स्वास्थ्य:** सुधार होगा।  
- **शुभ अंक:** 2, 5, 6, 7  
- **शुभ रंग:** आसमानी  

### **4. कर्क (Cancer)**
- **मुख्य भविष्यवाणी:** सामान्य लाभ।  
- **स्वास्थ्य:** ध्यान देने की आवश्यकता।  
- **पारिवारिक जीवन:** साथियों के साथ समय बिताएं।  
- **करियर:** अनुशासन बनाए रखें।  
- **शुभ अंक:** 2, 6, 7  
- **शुभ रंग:** पर्ल वाइट  

### **5. सिंह (Leo)**
- **मुख्य भविष्यवाणी:** नेतृत्व क्षमता बढ़ेगी।  
- **सामाजिक स्थिति:** मान-सम्मान बढ़ेगा।  
- **नए प्रयास:** अनुकूल समय।  
- **शुभ अंक:** 1, 3, 9  
- **शुभ रंग:** सुनहरा  

### **6. कन्या (Virgo)**
- **मुख्य भविष्यवाणी:** सतर्कता बरतें।

# Bihar Braces for Intense Heat Wave as Temperatures Soar to 42°C

## Severe Heat Wave Alert Issued Across Bihar

Bihar is currently experiencing extreme weather conditions with temperatures crossing 42°C in several districts. The Meteorological Department has issued a heat wave warning effective from Thursday, predicting intense heat conditions across multiple districts for the next three days.

## Affected Districts

The heat wave is expected to particularly impact:
- **East and West Champaran**
- **Gopalganj**
- **Buxar**
- **Kaimur**
- **Gaya**
- **Aurangabad**
- **Bhagalpur**

A total of 18 districts are expected to face severe heat conditions with dry weather prevailing across these regions.

## Slight Relief Expected After Three Days

While the immediate forecast predicts intense heat, there may be some relief after three days. The weather is expected to change with possibilities of:
- Thunderstorms
- Lightning
- Rainfall in some districts

This change is anticipated to bring temporary respite from the scorching temperatures currently affecting the state.

## Precautions Recommended

Residents are advised to:
- Stay hydrated
- Avoid direct sun exposure during peak hours (11 AM to 4 PM)
- Wear light-colored, loose clothing
- Keep homes well-ventilated

The state administration is monitoring the situation closely and may issue further advisories as needed.

**How to Create Viral AI-Generated Videos of Celebrities: A Step-by-Step Guide**  

In the age of AI, creating viral videos featuring celebrities has become easier than ever. If you've ever wondered how to make those entertaining AI-generated clips that are trending on Instagram and other platforms, this step-by-step guide will walk you through the entire process in simple terms.  

### **Step 1: Choose the Right AI Tool**  
To create AI-generated celebrity videos, you’ll need an AI tool that can generate realistic images and voices. Some popular options include:  
- **Larado AI**  
- **Ideogram AI**  
- **Pickle AI**  
- **ChatGPT (for image generation)**  

For this tutorial, we’ll use **Pickle AI** as an example.  

### **Step 2: Generate the Celebrity Image**  
1. **Sign up** for an account on Pickle AI.  
2. Click on **"Create"** and select the **9:16 aspect ratio** (ideal for social media).  
3. Choose the **"Model"** option and select **"Flux Snell"** for better image quality.  
4. Enter the **celebrity’s name** (e.g., "Narendra Modi") in the prompt box.  
5. Click **"Generate"** and wait for the AI to create the image.  
6. Download the image you like.  

*Alternative:* You can also use **ChatGPT (ChatGPT-4 with DALL·E)** to generate images by typing:  
- *"Imagine [celebrity name] selling sugarcane juice"*  

### **Step 3: Clone the Celebrity’s Voice**  
To make the video realistic, you’ll need the celebrity’s voice. Here’s how to clone it using **Headra AI**:  
1. **Sign up** for a Headra AI account.  
2. Click **"Try Now"** and upload the celebrity’s image.  
3. Go to **"Audio Script"** and select **"Generate Speech."**  
4. Click **"Create Voice"** and upload an audio clip of the celebrity’s voice (you can download it from YouTube).  
5. Name the voice and click **"Submit Voice."**  
6. Once processed, enter the **dialogue** you want the AI to generate (e.g., *"Fresh sugarcane juice, only ₹20!"*).  
7. Click **"Generate Audio"** and wait for the AI to create the voice clip.  

### **Step 4: Combine Image & Voice to Create the Video**  
1. In **Headra AI**, click **"Add to Video"** to merge the image and voice.  
2. Click **"Generate Video"** and wait for the AI to process.  
3. Once done, **download the video** and share it on social media!  

### **Final Result**  
Your AI-generated video will look something like this:  
*"Fresh sugarcane juice, only ₹20! Come to our juice cart!"*  

### **Conclusion**  
With AI tools like **Pickle AI and Headra AI**, you can create **viral celebrity videos** in minutes. Whether for fun or marketing, this method is simple and effective.  

**Pro Tip:** Experiment with different celebrities and dialogues to make your content stand out!  

If you found this guide helpful, **like, share, and subscribe** for more AI tutorials. Don’t forget to hit the **bell icon** to get notified about new videos! 🚀
